thread.title: Young boy jumps on a cow for a $20 bet with his father
thread.title_full: Young boy jumps on a cow for a $20 bet with his father

title: Young boy jumps on a cow for a $20 bet with his father
text: comments A small child was caught on camera being thrown from a cow after his father encouraged him to do it for money. The father explains the situation to set the scene, saying: 'he's trying to sneak up on that steer over there and jump on its back, I told him I'd give him $20.' But even his little sister appears to have more sense than the men of the family, pointing out 'that's not safe.' The whole family share a nervous laugh - it is not clear how likely they believe it will be that the stunt goes wrong. Although the little boy does jump onto the cattle, it instantly lurches up and tosses him through the air. The camera cuts as the concerned family gasp, scream and rush over to check if the youngster is okay. The boy, identified as 'Asher' in the post accompanying the video, sneaks up behind the cow in a bid to mount it RELATED ARTICLES
